item.title: About C++ Minor
item.description: I'm Yuwen Wu (or atyuwen), a senior graphics & engine programmer at Netease Games. I'm currently working on an in-house cross-platform game engine named Messiah Engine. Over the past decade, I gained a lot from so many excellent blogs. Now it's 2020s, I decide to start my own blog: C++ Minor, and wish I could also share something usefull to the community — mostly about algorithms and computer graphics. Following are some additional things I'd like to declare:
